subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong will race against the past two Tour de France winners when the five-day Vuelta a Castilla y León begins Monday. Armstrong, a seven-time Tour champion, will line up against Carlos Sastre (2008) and Alberto Contador (2007) for the first time since his return after three and a half years of retirement. The 37-year-old Armstrong finished 125th in the Milan-San Remo classic on Saturday.
